channel.title: Starting gear
channel.description: How do i change the gear that you start out with? And also how do i switch to my no-ip after i have ports ready and unblocked?

item.title: Starting gear
item.dc:creator: @vosenschaap vosenschaap
item.description:
@vosenschaap wrote:

for changing the starter gear go to player.jave
u will fins somthing like this:
//Giving the player an unique look
playerEquipment[playerHat]=1053;
playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052;
playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
playerEquipment[playerChest]=3058;
playerEquipment[playerShield]=1187;
playerEquipment[playerLegs]=3059;
playerEquipment[playerHands]=6629;
playerEquipment[playerFeet]=6619;
playerEquipment[playerRing]=6735;
playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;
so the last numbers are the item id’s so if u wanne change it change the id’s to the ones u want i hope this will help u

Read full topic
